page.title: 04FECHINE'S DAY COALISLAND 2
page.content: I get my dinner made in school which is free because my dad is unemployed. Other children pay 60p and some children bring their own sandwiches and their drink. My favourite dinner is {chips, fish fingers and beans } followed by{ice-cream and jelly}. At 2.00 P.M. we have lessons on {Cycling {Proficiency}and I go home at 3.00. When I go home I water the vegetables and the flowers. Sometimes I ride my horse. I play for a while with my friends from the {HOUSING ESTATE} nearby and then I go inside and do my homework. After tea I watch {T.V.}for a short time- I don't really like it and at 10.00 P.M. ,after we say the family{ROSARY}, I go to bed.
